original_text: Leah became pregnant and gave birth to a son. She named him Reuben, for she said, “It is because the Lord has seen my misery. Surely my husband will love me now.”
korean_text: 레아가 임신하여 아들을 낳고 그 이름을 르우벤이라 하여 이르되 여호와께서 나의 괴로움을 돌보셨으니 이제는 내 남편이 나를 사랑하리로다 하였더라

sentences.original_text: and gave birth to a son
It is because the Lord has seen my misery
Surely my husband will love me now
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 분명히 내 남편이 나를 사랑할 것이다
